official_title: A resolution authorizing the chairman of the Senate Select Committee on  Presidential Campaign Activities to testify and produce committee records before the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of New York pursuant to subpoenas issued in a criminal case pending in such court.

summary.text: Authorizes the chairman of the Senate Select Committee on Presidential Campaign Activities to testify and produce committee records before the United States District Court for the Southern District of New York pursuant to subpoenas issued in a criminal case pending in such court.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the chairman of the Senate Select Committee on  Presidential Campaign Activities to testify and produce committee records before the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of New York pursuant to subpoenas issued in a criminal case pending in such court.
